channel.title: Karma's Retribution New | 317 | 70% Economy | 30% PvP
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i49.tinypic.com/30dau85.png[/img]
[url=http://www.karmasretribution.com/forums/webclient.php][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/playnav-Copy.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.karmasretribution.com/forums/][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/forumsnav-Copy.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWe2n9XGllSfsF0beDBz5Aw?feature=mhee][img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/youtubenav-Copy.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/whatis-1.png[/img]
[b]Karma's Retribution is a brand new 317 RSPS that's main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we'd like Karma's Retribution to be everyones final stay.[/b]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/Community.png[/img]
[b]Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Karma's Retribution, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn't get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy. [/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ihuiv4.png[/img]
[b]Competition? Ever played real easy Runescape Servers that got you maxed within an hour? You'll eventually get bored of it and what surprises me even more is that they have highscores on those servers. Here on Karma's Retribution we offer a low, but not too low exp rate to increase competitivity. If a games not competitive why play it? It's one of the things that made Runescape players stick around Runescape. Ofcourse this doesn't mean our xp rates are gonna be like Runescape, we know the general population who are looking into RSPS's are basically looking for a chill community and an easy way out to spending loads of hours training a skill. Our highscores were made to promote competitivity and we hope to see everyone strive to become #1[/b]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/features.png[/img]
[u][b]Bosses[/b][/u] -General Graador (Bandos Boss) -Kree' arra (Armadyl Boss) -Commander Zilyana (Saradomin God) -K'ril Tsutsaroth (Zarmork God) -King Black Dragon -Giant Mole -King Daggonoths -Bork -Corporal Beast -Kalphite Queen
[b][u]Minigames[/u][/b] -Dominion Tower -Death Rooms -Warriors Guild -Duel Arena -Barrows -Fight Caves -Ice Path Agility Minigame -Recipe for Disaster
[b][u]Miscellaneous[/u][/b] -VPS Hosted -Resizable Client -Unique Player Panel -Unique Teleport Panel (No more boring PI Mage Book teleing) -Unique Shop System (No more clicking NPC Shopping) -Challenging XP Rates -Easy Money Making -Quick Prayers -Working Polypore Staff -Working Armadyl Battlestaff + Storm of Armadyl -Unique way of Imbuing Rings -Full God Book page filling -Player Owned Shops -Player Clipped Following -NPC Clipped Following -24 Skills to Train -Skill Prestiging + Rewards -Vote for Cash/Item System -Website Highscores -Unique FunPK and Team FunPK Arenas -5 Different Yell Channels -Price Checker -Curse Prayers -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Unique Money Pouch/Bag -Bank Pins -120 Dungeoneering + Dungeoneering Master Cape -Max and Completionist Capes -Flax Spinning -Tokhaar-Kal -New Torva Models -New Dragon Models -Glacior Boots (Steadfast, Glaiven and Ragefire) -Zaryte Bow -Royal C'Bow -Torva w/ Hp Effect -Squeal of Fortune -Loyalty System + Shop
Hope To See You In-Game! -Karma's Retribution Staff Team[/b][/color]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/screenie_zps024464a6.png[/img]
[img]http://i171.photobucket.com/albums/u320/12368146/korasi_zps79019bdc-1_zps5b65bd43.jpg[/img]

item.title: Karma's Retribution New | 317 | 70% Economy | 30% PvP
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Your crowns are horrid.

Your bank tabs are horrid.

Interfaces are horrid and cramped.

Work on quality.

Read full topic

item.title: Karma's Retribution New | 317 | 70% Economy | 30% PvP
item.dc:creator: @Karma_K1 Karma_K
item.description:
@Karma_K1 wrote:

[center]

30dau85.png700×125

Karma’s Retribution is a brand new 317 RSPS that’s main focus will be on Community. Here we strive to create a home for everyone and we’d like Karma’s Retribution to be everyones final stay.

Community to us means family, clan, democracy, and basically keeping the players Entertained/Happy. Here on Karma’s Retribution, all suggestions and decisions are brought to the players, everything said by a player is considered top priority. However, the staff are here to make the tough decisions, so dont complain if you didn’t get what you wanted. We try our best to keep the all players happy.

Competition? Ever played real easy Runescape Servers that got you maxed within an hour? You’ll eventually get bored of it and what surprises me even more is that they have highscores on those servers. Here on Karma’s Retribution we offer a low, but not too low exp rate to increase competitivity. If a games not competitive why play it? It’s one of the things that made Runescape players stick around Runescape. Ofcourse this doesn’t mean our xp rates are gonna be like Runescape, we know the general population who are looking into RSPS’s are basically looking for a chill community and an easy way out to spending loads of hours training a skill. Our highscores were made to promote competitivity and we hope to see everyone strive to become #1

Bosses
-General Graador (Bandos Boss)
-Kree’ arra (Armadyl Boss)
-Commander Zilyana (Saradomin God)
-K’ril Tsutsaroth (Zarmork God)
-King Black Dragon
-Giant Mole
-King Daggonoths
-Bork
-Corporal Beast
-Kalphite Queen

Minigames
-Dominion Tower
-Death Rooms
-Warriors Guild
-Duel Arena
-Barrows
-Fight Caves
-Ice Path Agility Minigame
-Recipe for Disaster

Miscellaneous
-VPS Hosted
-Resizable Client
-Unique Player Panel
-Unique Teleport Panel (No more boring PI Mage Book teleing)
-Unique Shop System (No more clicking NPC Shopping)
-Challenging XP Rates
-Easy Money Making
-Quick Prayers
-Working Polypore Staff
-Working Armadyl Battlestaff + Storm of Armadyl
-Unique way of Imbuing Rings
-Full God Book page filling
-Player Owned Shops
-Player Clipped Following
-NPC Clipped Following
-24 Skills to Train
-Skill Prestiging + Rewards
-Vote for Cash/Item System
-Website Highscores
-Unique FunPK and Team FunPK Arenas
-5 Different Yell Channels
-Price Checker
-Curse Prayers
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Unique Money Pouch/Bag
-Bank Pins
-120 Dungeoneering + Dungeoneering Master Cape
-Max and Completionist Capes
-Flax Spinning
-Tokhaar-Kal
-New Torva Models
-New Dragon Models
-Glacior Boots (Steadfast, Glaiven and Ragefire)
-Zaryte Bow
-Royal C’Bow
-Torva w/ Hp Effect
-Squeal of Fortune
-Loyalty System + Shop

Hope To See You In-Game!
-Karma’s Retribution Staff Team[/b][/color]
